name: Can I design the layout of my survey how I like?
title: Can I design the layout of my survey how I like?
body:
Overview

This article explains the layout design options available for surveys in EFS Survey, including standard layout customization and advanced professional layout editing.

 

Information

EFS Survey provides users with flexibility in designing their survey layouts, offering both standard and advanced customization options.

  • Standard Layout Options
  • Professional Layout Editor

 

Standard Layout Options

EFS Survey offers a standard layout option that allows users to customize various aspects of their survey's appearance:

  • Upload college logos
  • Modify colors and fonts
  • Adjust spacing

 

Professional Layout Editor

For more advanced customization, EFS Survey provides a professional layout editor:

  • Enables desired layout through adjustments to style sheets
  • Requires knowledge of HTML and CSS

 

FAQ

Can I design the layout of my survey how I like?

Yes, EFS Survey provides both standard layout options for basic customization and a professional layout editor for advanced users with HTML and CSS knowledge. This allows you to design your survey layout according to your preferences and requirements.
